title: Import Conversations
description: Import chat history from ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini or other sources
supportedFormats: Supports ChatGPT, Claude, and Gemini exports

platformHint.chatgpt: Export from ChatGPT: Settings > Data controls > Export data
platformHint.claude: Export from Claude: Settings > Privacy > Export data
platformHint.gemini: Export from Gemini: Use Google Takeout (takeout.google.com)

options.preserveTimestampsDesc: Keep original creation dates from ChatGPT
options.generateNewIdsDesc: Create new unique IDs for imported conversations

errors.title: Error
errors.unknownFormat: Unknown file format. Please use a ChatGPT, Claude, or Gemini export file.
errors.useCogniaImport: This is a Cognia backup file. Use the standard Import button instead.
errors.parseWarnings: Some conversations could not be parsed
